_comment: Backend ESLint Configuration - See LINTING_STANDARDS.md for examples and .cursorrules for AI tool guidance

rules._comment_no_explicit_any: Discourage use of 'any' type. Use proper types from types/ directory, 'unknown', or type assertions. Set to 'warn' for gradual migration.
rules._comment_explicit_return_type: Explicit return types not required - TypeScript can infer return types. Set to 'off' for flexibility.
rules._comment_no_unused_vars: Error on unused variables/parameters. Prefix unused with '_' to ignore (e.g., _unusedParam).
